summary:
More saturated lighting and new beautiful sunglare.
Please, read \"changelog\" for more information.
descriptionHtml:
More saturated lighting and new beautiful sunglare.
Please, read \"changelog\" for more information.

!!! News !!!
*Version 1.1 is available now.
*Added before/after-screenshots.
*[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198010995891]My profile[/url] on Steam.
*Also you can download this mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=75765621]here[/url]. (Steam Workshop)

Changlog:

1.1
-More powerful sun glare
-Fixed some bugs of sunlight

1.0
-Added new sunglare
-More powerful sun brightness
-Fixed saturation for sunny and cloudy weather types
-Changed part of weather types
-Removed \"fog near\"
-Increased distance of \"fog far\"


F.A.Q.
Q: Will the new version of the mod?
A: Yes, mode will be updated and improved.

Q: This mod affects the performance?
A: No.

Q: How to install this mod?
A: Just extract files to ...Skyrim \\ Data

Q: This mod available in Steam Workshop?
A: Yes. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=75765621]Here[/url].

Please, comment this topic! =)
author: Mark 3D
